info_avion: The plane game is a game where you will have to make pushes spontaneously to get the most balloons as you can in less than XX minutes.
info_nageur:
In the swimmer game, you will have to make regular pushes to keep the swimmer closest to the center line. 
600m run = 5 minutes
info_temp: In this game, you will have to push during 6 seconds to be able to jump on the upper platform.
